title: Get recommended interest and action categories

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. Allowed value: "application/json"

parameters.name: region_codes
parameters.description: List of country or region codes. For example: ["US", "JP", "KR"]

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: ID of the mobile app that you want to promote. This field in optional and only valid if you want to promote a mobile app.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of error codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: interest_category_id
fields.description: Interest category ID. It can used as one of the targeting settings when creating an ad group.

fields.name: placements
fields.description: List of placements that the interest categories can be used. If blank is returned, it means the interest category can be used in all placements.

fields.name: special_industries
fields.description: Ad categories. Enum values: HOUSING : Ads for real estate listings, homeowners insurance, mortgage loans or other related opportunities. EMPLOYMENT : Ads for job offers, internship, professional certification programs or other related opportunities. CREDIT : Ads for credit card offers, auto loans, long-term financing or other related opportunities. Note : If the returned value is empty( [] ), it means that the interest categories do not support any industry types. This field is only supported for advertisers who are registered in America or Canada.

fields.name: action_category_id
fields.description: Action category ID. It can be used as one of the targeting settings when creating an ad group.

fields.name: scene
fields.description: Action category scene. Enum values: CREATOR_RELATED , VIDEO_RELATED .

fields.name: special_industries
fields.description: Ad categories. Enum values: HOUSING : Ads for real estate listings, homeowners insurance, mortgage loans or other related opportunities. EMPLOYMENT : Ads for job offers, internship, professional certification programs or other related opportunities. CREDIT : Ads for credit card offers, auto loans, long-term financing or other related opportunities. Note : If the returned value is empty( [] ), it means that the interest categories do not support any industry types. This field is only supported for advertisers who are registered in America or Canada.

action_categories.description: TikTok users who have followed healthy lifestyle or fitness creators.
TikTok users who have followed creators that post content about other types of transportation vehicles.
TikTok users who have followed creators that post selfies.
